this_title: The Crimes That Changed Us Season 1
trans_title: 改变美国的罪案 第一季
introduction: Produced with no talking head interviews, this series keeps audiences INSIDE the story from start to finish. The Crimes That Changed Us blends intimate archival material to transport us into the heart of stories that have shaped the American journey.
chinese_title: 改变美国的罪案 第一季
foreign_title: The Crimes That Changed Us Season 1
